verses.roman:
ebe alpa saṅkhyā kari' kara saṅkīrtana"
haridāsa kahe,--"śuna mora satya nivedana

synonyms: ebe—now; alpa saṅkhyā—a reduced number of chanting; kari'-doing; kara saṅkīrtana—chant the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā-mantra; haridāsa kahe—Haridāsa Ṭhākura replied; śuna—kindly hear; mora—my; satya—real; nivedana—submission.
translation: The Lord concluded, "Now, therefore, please reduce the fixed number of times you chant the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā-mantra." Haridāsa Ṭhākura replied, "Kindly hear my real plea.
